Stab him: You try to stab him and he slaps your knife out of your hand and stabs your with it.`KNIFE ENDING

Panic: You panic, and the Foo eats you.`PANIC ENDING
Shoot another bullet: You shoot another bullet, and the Foo dies. You win!`GUN ENDING

Run away: You try, and fail, to run. The Foo eats you.`FAILED ESCAPE ENDING
Hide: You hide, but the Foo sees you. He comes over and eats you.`THERE'S NOWHERE TO HIDE ENDING
